<a class="external-links" rel="nofollow" href="https://support.apple.com/en-us/103271">Release notes for enterprises

<a class="external-links" rel="nofollow" href="https://developer.apple.com/documentation/macos-release-notes/macos-12_1-release-notes">Release notes for developers

<a class="external-links" rel="nofollow" href="https://support.apple.com/en-us/102874">About the security content of macOS Ventura 12.1/a>

This update includes bug fixes and security updates and is reccommended for all users.

Refer to Apple's webpage for information about these updates:

<a class="external-links" rel="nofollow" href="https://support.apple.com/en-us/103271">Release notes for enterprises

<a class="external-links" rel="nofollow" href="https://developer.apple.com/documentation/macos-release-notes/macos-12_2-release-notes">Release notes for developers

<a class="external-links" rel="nofollow" href="https://support.apple.com/en-us/102848">About the security content of macOS Ventura 12.2

This update provides important security updates and fixes an issue for Intel-based Mac computers that may cause the battery to drain during sleep when connected to Bluetooth peripherals.

Refer to Apple's webpage for information about these updates:

<a class="external-links" rel="nofollow" href="https://support.apple.com/en-us/103271">Release notes for enterprises

<a class="external-links" rel="nofollow" href="https://support.apple.com/en-us/103181">About the security content of macOS Ventura 12.2.1
